ComicInfo.Summary:
The endgame is here! Vampblade has gathered every ally, including reuniting the Danger Doll Squad (featuring Zombie Tramp, DollFace, and Black Betty)! Now they must do whatever it takes to stop the evil Glarkian horde from consuming the earth! And with only one issue before the series' landmark 50th issue, anything could happen! Features 1 of 3 special connecting variant covers this month by Boo & Dave!!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Marco Maccagni | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marco Maccagni | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | David Reynolds | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | David Reynolds | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Andrew Herman | 5 | F | Risqué Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Herman | 6 | Note: Issue #49 in a series.
